Please excuse my ignorance as I am new to this, but how do you mount the image? I don't understand.

@kathiemc51

get this http://wincdemu.sysprogs.org/

It will probably ask for restart

after you restart, unpack the files

bouble click the .iso file or whatever comes out of the unpacking and it should ask what letter drive you want to mount it as.

just pick whatever letter you want

it will mount up

look under "computer" and it should now show that the game disk is there and find the setup.exe file on the disk

and now go through install crap

simple?
